5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin ‘Abdullah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) was asked: ‘Which prayer is best?’ He said: ‘That with the longer Qunut.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي طُولِ الْقِيَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning standing for a long time in Prayer
